section.title: PTZ Home Position
section.para: PTZ Home Position section specifies Client ability to move a PTZ Device to its home position.

section.title: Feature Level Requirement:
section.para: Check Condition based on Device Features: PTZ Home Position is supported by Device.

listitem.para: Client connects to Device to manage the home position of a PTZ Node.

Client is considered as supporting PTZ Home Position if the following conditions are met:
Client is able to move PTZ Device to its home position using the GotoHomePosition operation

Client is considered as NOT supporting PTZ Home Position if ANY of the following is TRUE:
No Valid Device Response to GotoHomePosition request.

section.title: PTZ HOME POSITION
section.para: Feature Under Test: Goto Home Position (PtzHomePosition_PtzGotoHomePosition)
Test Purpose: To verify that Client is able to move PTZ Device to its home position using the GotoHomePosition operation.

listitem.para: The Network Trace Capture files contains at least one conversation between Client and Device with GotoHomePosition operation present.

para.emphasis: Test Procedure (expected to be reflected in network trace file):

listitem.para: Client invokes GotoHomePosition request message to move PTZ Device to its home position.
Device responds with code HTTP 200 OK and GotoHomeResponse message.
Client GotoHomePosition request messages are valid according to XML Schemas listed in Namespaces AND

Client GotoHomePosition request in Test Procedure fulfills the following requirements:
[S1] Client request contains "<GotoHomePosition>" tag after the "<Body>" tag AND
[S2] "<GotoHomePosition>" includes tag: "<ProfileToken>" with non-empty string value of specific token AND
[S3] Device response contains "HTTP/* 200 OK" AND
[S4] Device response contains "<GotoHomePositionResponse>" tag.
